original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at Rs328.60/75 to US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at Rs328.60/75 to the US dollar on Tuesday, from 328.00/20 on Monday, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 14.35/60 percent almost unchanged from 14.50/75 percent Friday.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 14.55/65 percent from 14.60/75 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 14.55/65 percent down from 14.55/70 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.65/75 percent from 14.70/85 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.35/60 percent, up from 14.55/70 percent. (Colombo/Nov21/2023)
